version_description:
Minor fixes and updates:
1. Fixed: Missing checkpoints in some couriers
2. Updated: Show number keyboard for option input
3. Updated: Ignore invalid courier detection results
4. Updated: New layout for tracking details

1. Updated to 64bit binary.
2. Added support for Retina Display.
3. Minor bug fixes.

Fixed: Weird grey area of pull down list
Fixed: Missing expected delivery date
Fixed: Many crashes
Added: Support for "Tracking Destination Country"
Added: Compatible with USPS barcode
Added: Support for iPad

1. Fixed: Missing expected delivery date after reload
2. Updated: AfterShip icon

- Lots of layout fixes
- Better support for 4.7-Inch and 5.5-Inch iPhone
- Disable third party keyboard for better user experience

Bug fix:
- Include location info in tracking results
- Show `Ask this shipment?` pop up when app launch
- Fix courier icon

Bug fix:
- Include location info in tracking results
- Show `Ask this shipment?` pop up when app launch
- Fix courier icon

- Barcode scanner improvement
- Minor bug fixes

- Add search feature for courier list

• New: All new design
• New: A new indicator to show when shipments have updates
• New: Better copy / paste of your tracking numbers
• New: Customise your notifications settings

Bug fix: Auto copy/paste prompt

Forward your order emails from any stores (Amazon, Showpo, Paypal, Google Shopping, Shopify, etc.) to: track@aftership.com
## New
- Support verify email after sign up.
- Show the brand info in your tracking detail.
- Show the order info in your tracking detail.

Forward your order emails from any stores (Amazon, Showpo, Paypal, Google Shopping, Shopify, etc.) to: track@aftership.com

Update: We have updated the wording of the package status “info received" to "shipment is being prepared", so users can understand it better.
Update: The order tracking detail page will now display more order information including product title, images, and discount.

Update: We have updated the wording of the package status “info received" to "shipment is being prepared", so users can understand it better.
Update: The order tracking detail page will now display more order information including product title, images, and discount.

Update: We have updated the wording of the package status “info received" to "shipment is being prepared", so users can understand it better.
Update: The order tracking detail page will now display more order information including product title, images, and discount.

Update: We supported Royal Mail. We are continuously putting efforts to add more new couriers.
Update: Improved Sign up/ Login UI for streamlined app registration and use.
